channel.title: Knight Rework-Cold Steel now kills anyone
channel.description: Passive: Armored- You will survive the first attack you block with Defend. Night 1 Ability: Defend- Protect a player, giving your life to kill their attackers. Bypasses death immunity. Night 2 Ability: Cold Steel- Kill a player. If they were an ally, you will kill them and take your life the next night. Note: You can't be healed if you commit suicide. Also, can't be used until Night 3. Doesn't go through death immunity.

item.title: Knight Rework-Cold Steel now kills anyone
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
It doesn’t confirm the CS target is scum if there was no physician/alchemist on the knight, because the target could have been NK/MM/Scorned/Fool and the knight could have been killed simply through other sources. This would happen more often than you think, because the knight tends to CS suspicious targets, whereas scum is actively killing BD. Also the knight can only CS after a certain period, so more members are dead already (usually not the NK/MM/Scorned/Fool). So BD needs to work together to obtain this powerful interaction, with 2 largely unconfirmable BD classes. Sounds perfectly balanced to me.
